column3: Latest;Pursat: A fisherman in Veal Veng district caught------ 100 kilogram crocodile
column4: and was understandably shocked early on September 25
column8: Pursat Province.------A fisherman named Moeun Mim said that on September 24
column10: he went to set fish traps  in the Mekong River Sanctuary
column12: he went to check his nets  and found a large crocodile weighing about 100 kilograms .------The fishermen reported the find to the authorities to intervene. The fisherman also said he had never seen the crocodile before
column13: but was told there used to be some in the past.------The crocodile was taken to the border gate of 825. There is no indication yet whether the crocodile is from the wild or has escaped or been released from a farm.------However
